```{r}
# Installing Harbinger
#install.packages"harbinger")
```

```{r}
# Loading Harbinger
library(daltoolbox)
library(harbinger) 
```

```{r}
# class harutils
  hutils <- harutils()
```

```{r}
values <- rnorm(30, mean = 0, sd = 1)
```

```{r}
v1 <- hutils$har_distance_l1(values)
har_plot(harbinger(), v1)
```
```{r}
v2 <- hutils$har_distance_l2(values)
har_plot(harbinger(), v2)
```
